item.description:
Then we can gather inside the event generally near the top of the stairway/ elevator that goes down to the Mario Testino Exhibit so people can find us.  Try not to be late, as it fills up quickly and then they stop letting people in. I am BIll, 6'4".

The cost of museum entry is $25, but if people  have dual memberships they can get others in for free, so if you have a dual let us know via meetup comments, or RSVP comment.

I will email my phone # before the event to attendees so if you miss us in the foyer you can call or text (preferred) if you can't find us when/if you get in.   Look at everyone's pictures so we know who is going.  I will try to bring a copy of the pictures and will keep an eye out to say hi & introduce people.

BE SURE TO GET THERE EARLY, BY 6:30, AS THE PLACE FILLS UP AND THEY TURN PEOPLE AWAY.  You need a license or Mass ID to enter.

We can go out after for food or drinks at a convenient location, such as a restaurant on Huntuington Ave.

ANSWERS to QUESTIONS (12-4-12):

Everyone who is there before 6:15pm will go in at 6:15pm. People who come later can look around the lobby by the statue for other attendees for a few minutes and then go in soon to insure admission, and look for us.  Go early (by ~6:30) or reserve a ticket online at MFA site to make sure you get in before it is packed and they stop admission.  If there is an issue reserving online, call the museum and reserve by phone.

To reserve online tickets go to this link:

http://www.mfa.org/programs/special-event

Or try to find a member with dual membership. Most libraries have discounted passes available, also.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the Front Lobby, off Huntington Ave., at 6PM, by the statue of Orpheus and Cerebus (3 headed dog). We will go in at 6:15pm.
item.name: MFA First Friday
